text: ah, dr. cooper, thank goodness. i completely forgot your address. but then i remembered that i'd written it on my hand. lucky for me, i didn't confuse it with what i'd written on my other hand, which are the coordinates for a newly discovered neutron star. because if i tried to go there, i'd be crushed by hypergravity. anyway, hello.
